name: Infernalis Prototype
description:
IMPORTANT READ ME

Play the game in full screen mode for better experience.  See below for important introduction to game mechanics (the game doesn't have a tutorial yet) and for the contact info. We look forward to your feedback :)

CONTROLS:

ActionMouse & KeyboardController
MovementWASDLeft Stick
DodgeLeft Shift
BLight Attack
Left Click
XHeavy Attack
Right Click
YDeflectCLBStanceXRight stick
AbilityFRBUltimateRRT

GAME MECHANICS:

Combos:

Light attacks can be chained up to three times. Heavy Attacks can be chained twice. Combine Light attacks chain with two  Heavy attacks for a Combo Finisher. Combo Finishers deal bonus damage the higher the combo. Abilities and Deflects can extend Combos.

Counter attack:

After a successful Deflect, press Heavy Attack for a powerful Counterattack.

Ability:

Deals damage in an AoE and heals the player for a moderate amount.

Ultimate:

 Increases the player’s attack damage substantially for a short duration.

Stances:

Defensive stance (shield icon) decreases damage taken. Offensive stance (sword icon) icreases damage dealt. Switching stances boosts the corresponding effect for a duration.
